word: The saving grace of God upon us, the increased conception of His greatness, justice, mercy, and love, will not fill our hearts to no purpose. This knowledge of God, which Jesus came from heaven to impart, must not be trifled with. The love of God cannot remain in our possession unless it is expressed.--Letter 48, Dec. 13, 1888, to David H. Lamson, a conference evangelist and administrator.
